item.title: Instant Pot Chicken Alfredo
item.description: Prep: 20 minutes Cook: 20 minutes Total: 40 minutes Servings: 4 Ingredients 1 pound boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch chunks Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste 1 tablespoon unsalted butter 3 cloves garlic, minced ¼ cup dry white wine 2 cups chicken stock 1 cup heavy cream 8 ounces fettuccini noodles, broken in half 3 ounces freshly grated Parmesan 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley leaves Steps Season chicken with 3/4 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper.
